data.meanings: To turn, return, repentance and grief, turn a thing upside down, change, change direction, turn it about to it's face and back, turn inside out, change condition.. qalb = heart. mutaqallabun - time or place where any one is busily employed. munqalabin - place or time of turmoil, reverse, turn, the end. munqalibun - one who returns.
data.sentence: The word قُلُوبِهِمْ comes from the root ق ل ب and is associated with the meanings: To turn, return, repentance and grief, turn a thing upside down, change, change direction, turn it about to it's face and back, turn inside out, change condition.. qalb = heart. mutaqallabun - time or place where any one is busily employed. munqalabin - place or time of turmoil, reverse, turn, the end. munqalibun - one who returns.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كَانُوا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
The word مَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: To gain, acquire, seek after, gather (riches), do, commit, earn.
data.sentence: The word يَكْسِبُونَ comes from the root ك س ب and is associated with the meanings: To gain, acquire, seek after, gather (riches), do, commit, earn.
The word بَلْ comes from the root ب ل and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word كَلَّا comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.meanings: to be rusty, be dirty, feel qualmish, blind anyone (passion), be involved in a scrape, commit vice. rayn - rust, dirt, qualm, misgiving.
data.sentence: The word رَانَ comes from the root ر ي ن and is associated with the meanings: to be rusty, be dirty, feel qualmish, blind anyone (passion), be involved in a scrape, commit vice. rayn - rust, dirt, qualm, misgiving.
